snippet.title: Brothers In Arms Furious 4 | E3 Trailer [North America]
snippet.description:
http://www.brothersinarmsgame.com
Follow four fierce and fearless soldiers chasing the Fürher himself in the deadliest war ever known. As one of the Furious 4, players battle using special weaponry and unexpected combat abilities, against the greatest threat the world has ever faced: the Nazi uber-weaponry, result of the numerous years of experimentations of the Third Reich.
